properties.name: custom.system.particle.min-radius
properties.description: The min. radius of a particle.

properties.name: custom.system.particle.max-radius
properties.description: The max. radius of a particle.

properties.name: custom.system.particle.tao
properties.description: The mean time a particle need to get to the minimum radius.

properties.name: custom.system.particle.beta
properties.description: Experimental constant that defines the linearity between speed changes and blocks avoidance.

properties.name: custom.system.particle.max-speed
properties.description: The max. speed a particle can reach.

properties.name: custom.simulation.time-step
properties.description: The Simulation's time step, in seconds.

properties.name: custom.output.ovito
properties.description: The path for the Ovito file.
